name: KeyboardEvent.shiftKey
description: The KeyboardEvent.shiftKey read-only property is a Boolean that indicates if the shift key was pressed (true) or not (false) when the event occurred.

refs.name: Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Events Specification
refs.description: The definition of 'KeyboardEvent.shiftKey' in Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Events Specification.
